description: Format used to define classes of heroes in VCMI
title: VCMI hero class format

___index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.

___lowLevelChance.description: Chance to get specific primary skill on level-up, applicable for levels less than 10

___defaultTavern.description: Default chance for hero to appear in tavern, used only when value vas not set in tavern field

___commander.description: Identifier of creature that is used as commander by heroes

___tavern.description: Chance for this hero to appear in tavern of this factions. Reversed version of field "tavern" from town format

___secondarySkills.description: Chance to get specific secondary skill on level-up. All missing skills are considered to be banned

___affinity.description: Affinity of hero class, might or magic

___faction.description: Faction this hero class belongs to

___highLevelChance.description: Chance to get specific primary skill on level-up, applicable for levels starting from 10
